dialogue.chunk: We are automata. If you talk to us, we will repeat the same sentences over and over again.
However, some of us have gained... say, additional abilities, over time.
It's almost like consciousness. Almost...
When they gained more knowledge they learned to build actual robots.
However, those robots went mad once the disease hit them. They are like zombies now.
You look just like them, but how come you are not mad?
We still don't understand how these portals work.
We are not in the past, not really. This is just... we could call it a backup. A time backup.
You cannot alter the future here, but you can still obtain items. It should not work, but yet it does.
They say The Shopkeeper is immortal.
You cannot die if you have never been alive in the first place...
You obtain a "HEART CONTAINER!"
It increases your life by 1!
You obtain a "DUMMY ITEM"!
It's a worthless debug item. Not even that, really.
You obtain "DUMMY ITEM 2"!
It's not any more useful than the first dummy item. Sorry.
You obtain a "DIVING SUIT"!
It lets you stay underwater without dying.
You obtain a "RUSTY KEY"!
Despite being rusty, it can still open locks. Maybe.
You obtain a "MAP"!
It shows you all the rooms you have visited. Does not work in the past.
Press R.Shift to open the map.
You obtain a pair of "RUNNING BOOTS"!
Now you can run and climb faster.
You obtain a "SHIELD"!
It protects you from powerful attacks.
You obtain a "BOXING GLOVE"!
For some reason it makes your bullets more powerful.
You obtain a "GIANT FLY"!
It offers some protection.
You obtain an "OUTDATED MAP"!
It shows you all the rooms you have visited in the past.
Press R.Shift to open the map.
You cannot afford that.
Buy this item for %d gems?
